attributes.action: Stop the custom of automatic elevations to the Peerage for having held certain posts eg Speaker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems to be that simply by having held certain posts in public life a peerage is given automatically.  This happens whether the incumbent was effective or respected.  There is considerable public contempt for this process.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
